review_data.title: Schöner Ort / Personal OK / Essen teuer und schlechte Qualität
review_data.content: Ich habe einen Stadtzwicker, ein paar Schweinswürstchen mit Senf und Brot. Das Weissbrot war trocken und ungeniessbar, die Wurst gut....More

review_data.title: „Big“ city life
review_data.content: Nice place on a sunny day with surfers, swimmers and skaters all over. Trying to play california and the big easy. We enjoyed simple appetizers and cold beer but much more the young crowd giving Zurich a very relaxed atmosphere.

review_data.title: Nice spot for drinks and to hangout on a hot day
review_data.content: Stazione Paradisio is a cool summer bar that opens daily from 11.30-24 on nice weather days. The young lady that assisted me on my visit was super nice and also spoke English. The place sits just off the Limmat River and offers partial views. This...More

review_data.title: Love this place the best
review_data.content: The food they serve here, you can't get anywhere else in Zurich. There is always something new on the menu and the dishes are consistently fresh and delicious. The chefs are very knowledgeable about the food and really put their hearts into it. The venue...More
